div.div: CAN'T BE AS HARD AS LANDING CURIOSITY, RIGHT?

div.a: How NASA Plans To Bring Back A Little Bit Of Mars To Earth

div.div: Meet the scientists planning the next step in Martian exploration.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/139lonS&via=Digg&text=How NASA Plans To Bring Back A Little Bit Of Mars To Earth

div.a: How Twitter Gets In The Way Of Knowledge

div.div: Twitter has increasingly restricted access to the largest organized database of modern language in the world, despite its immense research value. It's a tragedy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WiR8jL&via=Digg&text=How Twitter Gets In The Way Of Knowledge

div.a: Meet The CIA Officer Going To Prison For Blowing The Whistle On Torture

div.div: Looking back, John C. Kiriakou admits he should have known better. But when the F.B.I. called him a year ago and invited him to stop by and “help us with a case,” he did not hesitate.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TR5x8P&via=Digg&text=Meet The CIA Officer Going To Prison For Blowing The Whistle On Torture

div.a: What A Human Looks Like Going Through An Airport X-Ray Machine

div.div: And now you know what happens when you ride in the baggage x-ray thing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z0QbP9&via=Digg&text=What A Human Looks Like Going Through An Airport X-Ray Machine

div.a: Reddit Rumored To Be Raising Money At A $400 Million Valuation

div.div: TechCrunch is hearing from a source that Reddit is planning to raise money at a $400 million valuation.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/139pkoW&via=Digg&text=Reddit Rumored To Be Raising Money At A $400 Million Valuation

div.div: Alison Atkins died on July 27 at age 16. Online, her family is losing its hold on her memory. Three days after the Toronto teen lost a long battle with a colon disease, her sister Jaclyn Atkins had a technician crack Alison's password-protected MacBook Pro

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XbkjIb&via=Digg&text=Who Controls Your Digital Legacy?

div.div: TOM WOLFE ON WALL STREET TODAY
25 years after his classic novel, "The Bonfire Of The Vanities," Tom Wolfe writes a searing indictment of how the world of finance went wrong and reveals who the new Masters of the Universe are.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VzwaAX&via=Digg&text=Eunuchs Of The Universe

div.div: EVEN EXPLAINED, IT'S STILL LIKE MAGIC

div.a: The Best Pickpocket In The World Shows You How He Does It

div.div: Amazing video of celeb pickpocket Apollo Robbins picking pockets newyorker.com/online/blogs...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vr86xC&via=Digg&text=The Best Pickpocket In The World Shows You How He Does It

div.a: Secret And Lies Of The Bailout

div.div: The federal rescue of Wall Street didn’t fix the economy – it created a permanent bailout state based on a Ponzi-like confidence scheme. And the worst may be yet to come.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VDDdpN&via=Digg&text=Secret And Lies Of The Bailout

div.a: Minecraft Is Recreating The Earth At 1:1500 Scale

div.div: A number of Minecraft users are joining up to recreate the entire planet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/138sedy&via=Digg&text=Minecraft Is Recreating The Earth At 1:1500 Scale

div.div: SIRI, WHY ARE PEOPLE AVOIDING ME?

div.a: This Guy Is Teaching Your iPhone To Detect Bad Breath

div.div: A tiny San Francisco startup, Adamant Technologies, is trying to give your iPhone the senses of smell and taste, too.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TEmPH8&via=Digg&text=This Guy Is Teaching Your iPhone To Detect Bad Breath

div.div: TOM CRUISE PRETENDED TO BE A UPS GUY

div.a: The 5 Craziest Ways Famous Actors Got Into Character

div.div: Some people might think that acting is the easiest job in the world. And that might be true, if you're a really shitty actor. But if you want to get good at it? Well, you have to be a little crazy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SddjN2&via=Digg&text=The 5 Craziest Ways Famous Actors Got Into Character

div.div: NOW JUST JUMP OUT OF AN AIRPLANE

div.a: GoPro Captured Trombone Playing Is Surprisingly Fantastic

div.div: The combination of a Trombone and a GoPro produces something fantastic.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VLRMH7&via=Digg&text=GoPro Captured Trombone Playing Is Surprisingly Fantastic

div.a: Totalitarian Restaurants And The New Tyranny Of Today’s Top Chefs

div.div: The reservation was nearly impossible to get. The meal will cost several hundred dollars. The chef is a culinary genius. But in the era of the four-hour, 40-course tasting menu, one key ingredient is missing: any interest in what the customer wants to eat.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X4VL3u&via=Digg&text=Totalitarian Restaurants And The New Tyranny Of Today’s Top Chefs

div.a: Smart-Guns Don't Kill The Wrong People

div.div: Gun owners and advocates are fond of saying, “Guns don’t kill people, people kill people.” This might be a more useful aphorism: Smart-guns don’t kill the wrong people.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XbDQrW&via=Digg&text=Smart-Guns Don't Kill The Wrong People

div.div: NOW KNOW WHAT iPHONE USERS FELT LIKE

div.a: The Strange Explanation Of Why Windows Phone Users Lost Access To Google Maps

div.div: On Friday, Windows Phone users supposedly found themselves unable to access Google Maps. But Google said it made no sudden change on its end to cause this. What happened?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UxUWzx&via=Digg&text=The Strange Explanation Of Why Windows Phone Users Lost Access To Google Maps

div.a: Iran Designing Software For Controlled Social Media Access

div.div: Iran is designing "intelligent software" that would give citizens restricted and controlled access to banned social networking sites, local media on Sunday quoted police chief Esmaeil Ahmadi Moghadam as saying.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/105LlWQ&via=Digg&text=Iran Designing Software For Controlled Social Media Access

div.a: Investigating The Mystery Behind These Three Lunar Craters

div.div: Looking at craters like these tell us about the Moon, but they also tell us about other objects in the solar system, too. What was it that hit here? Was it something unusual, or are small, fragile objects common in space?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wk7Ij9&via=Digg&text=Investigating The Mystery Behind These Three Lunar Craters

div.div: KATNISS WILL PROBABLY WIN NEXT YEAR
Add pet names to the list of things Twilight has ruined for everyone.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XzGiwe&via=Digg&text=Top Pet Names For 2012

div.a: Why Are Shaken Drinks Superior To Stirred Drinks?

div.div: Why would someone care about the manner in which their martini was mixed?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/113IzRf&via=Digg&text=Why Are Shaken Drinks Superior To Stirred Drinks?

div.a: Why We Need A Currency War With China

div.div: Joe Gagnon and Fred Bergsten at the Peterson Institute want the U.S. to offer the eight worst currency manipulators — China, Denmark, Hong Kong, Korea, Malaysia, Singapore, Switzerland and Taiwan — an ultimatum: Stop manipulating, or else we’ll launch a full fiscal assault.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10V9Ipq&via=Digg&text=Why We Need A Currency War With China
